title: Real world median
prompt:
An art gallery is selling five poster prints of paintings for $22, $26, $35, $50, and $64.
If the store started selling a sixth print for $45, by how many dollars would the median
sale price of the prints increase?
hint: The median is the middle value, when all the values are written in order.
feedback:
The median, or middle, cost of the five original prints is $35. When a sixth price is added to the list of prices, the median is the number halfway between the two middle prices, $35 and $45. The average of $35 and $45 is $40, so $40 is the new median price. The median price has changed from $35 to $40, a difference of $5.

The median cost of the prints would change by $5.
